definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to a plane .
examples: A planar projection of a three-dimensional object is its projection onto a plane.

definitions.definition: Able to be embedded in the plane with no edges intersecting .
examples: A complete graph with more than four nodes is never planar .

definitions.definition: Having a flat profile, not etched into a mesa .

main_definition: Of or pertaining to a plane .
secondary_definitions: ( graph theory , of a graph ) Able to be embedded in the plane with no edges intersecting .
( transistor chip , semiconductor devices ) Having a flat profile, not etched into a mesa .
